creator: ethan_chen@hotmail.com
text:
I cannot embed the User Defined Characters into the PDF.
For instance, I have created my own characters with a tool. It crreated two 
files: EUDC.tte and EUDC.euf. I put them under C:\WINDOWS\ and modified the 
value of SystemDefaultEUDC to C:\Windows\EUDC.tte using the regedit.exe. 
Therefore, all my word editor tools can show my own characters correctly. 
However, I cannnot and don't know how to embed those characters into PDF.

  I have looked all the documents I can found, but still cannot find a 
solution. Is it a bug? or on the to do list..?

Best regards,

Ethan
resetting severity from major to normal pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
